pull_request.title: fix invalid rule
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [x] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

Example: <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/100000>

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: m.fmkorea.com
issue.body:
### 필터 업데이트를 하신 후에도 작동이 안된다면, 아래 이메일로 문의해주세요. ### 도움이 필요하시면, [filters@adguard.com](mailto:filters@adguard.com) 으로 문의해주세요. > [!IMPORTANT] > [AdGuard for Android](https://adguard.com/ko/adguard-android/overview.html)인 경우에는 List-KR 필터와 사용하시는 웹 브라우저에 대한 HTTPS 필터링이 활성화되어있는지 확인해주세요. 또한, 캐시, 쿠키 및 사이트 데이터 삭제 또한 도움이 됩니다. _Google Play 스토어에 있는 [AdGuard Content Blocker](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.adguard.android.contentblocker&hl=ko)로는 차단이 어렵습니다._ > [!IMPORTANT] > 또한, AdGuard 유료 라이선스 없이 AdGuard for iOS를 사용하시는 분들은 점점 광고 차단하기 어려워질 수 있으니, 블랙 프라이데이 할인 중인 유니콘 프로보다 싼 [stacksocial.com](https://www.stacksocial.com/sales/adguard-family-plan-lifetime-subscription)에서 구입하신 뒤에 Safari 고급 보호 및 List-KR 필터를 활성화해주세요. > [!TIP] > AdGuard for Android에서 설정 탭 -> 일반 -> 앱과 필터 업데이트 -> 필터 자동 업데이트 값을 1시간으로 줄일 수 있습니다. --- ### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://m.fmkorea.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.fmkorea.com) ### Comment > 에펨코리아 홈페이지 광고 차단 우회 생겼습니다. 막아주세용ㅠ Username: `@없음` ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/pj45af2v4hcskokw0s0w8kgs8004s40705yoaypba0.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/edoigby682gc8c8kg00ck8sowg0gk8sg6tt88k80c0.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.2 System version: | iOS 17.2 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `시스템`, `기본`, `설정`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/dns/filter_1_ios.txt` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

comment.body: 현재 iOS에서 List-KR을 AdGuard 베이스 필터, AdGuard 기타 방해 요소 필터와 함께 사용하면 파워링크가 나옵니다. List-KR을 단독으로 사용하거나 List-KR, AdGuard 베이스 필터만 사용하거나 List-KR, AdGuard 기타 방해 요소 필터만 사용하는 경우에는 정상적으로 차단합니다. 세 필터를 모두 사용하는 경우에만 파워링크를 차단하지 못하는 현상이 나타납니다.

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
I guess that it might be caused by this rule - `backmarket.*##+js(set-cookie-reload, BM_User_Experience, false)` and adding exception:
```adblock
backmarket.*#@#+js(set-cookie-reload, BM_User_Experience, false)
```
to user rules maybe will fixes it.
But I'm not able to reproduce this issue.

comment.body:
> 현재 iOS에서 List-KR을 AdGuard 베이스 필터, AdGuard 기타 방해 요소 필터와 함께 사용하면 파워링크가 노출됩니다. List-KR을 단독으로 사용하거나 List-KR, AdGuard 베이스 필터만 사용하거나 List-KR, AdGuard 기타 방해 요소 필터만 사용하는 경우에는 정상적으로 차단합니다. 세 필터를 모두 사용하는 경우에만 파워링크를 차단하지 못하는 현상이 나타납니다. 필터 버전은 모두 최신 버전입니다.

며칠 전부터 계속 파워링크 차단이 됐다가 안 됐다가 오락가락합니다. 오늘 또다시 차단이 안 되길래 제보했는데 AdGuard 베이스 필터 2.3.25.44 버전으로 업데이트 이후 고쳐졌습니다.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Bug
labels.description: The issue is caused by a program bug

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

comment.body: Yes, https filtering is enabled by default only for specific applications. Sometimes an application does not trust third-party certificates and because of this the application itself may crash when https filtering is enabled. If the ads appear again, please clear the AdGuard filtering log, repeat the ads in the app and send screenshots of the filtering log with all requests from the app. Feel free to tag me.

issue.body:
### 필터 업데이트를 하신 후에도 작동이 안된다면, 아래 이메일로 문의해주세요. ### 도움이 필요하시면, [filters@adguard.com](mailto:filters@adguard.com) 으로 문의해주세요. > [!IMPORTANT] > [AdGuard for Android](https://adguard.com/ko/adguard-android/overview.html)인 경우에는 List-KR 필터와 사용하시는 웹 브라우저에 대한 HTTPS 필터링이 활성화되어있는지 확인해주세요. 또한, 캐시, 쿠키 및 사이트 데이터 삭제 또한 도움이 됩니다. _Google Play 스토어에 있는 [AdGuard Content Blocker](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.adguard.android.contentblocker&hl=ko)로는 차단이 어렵습니다._ > [!IMPORTANT] > 또한, AdGuard 유료 라이선스 없이 AdGuard for iOS를 사용하시는 분들은 점점 광고 차단하기 어려워질 수 있으니, 블랙 프라이데이 할인 중인 유니콘 프로보다 싼 [stacksocial.com](https://www.stacksocial.com/sales/adguard-family-plan-lifetime-subscription)에서 구입하신 뒤에 Safari 고급 보호 및 List-KR 필터를 활성화해주세요. > [!TIP] > AdGuard for Android에서 설정 탭 -> 일반 -> 앱과 필터 업데이트 -> 필터 자동 업데이트 값을 1시간으로 줄일 수 있습니다. --- ### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://m.fmkorea.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.fmkorea.com) ### Comment > 에펨코리아 홈페이지 광고 차단 우회 생겼습니다. 막아주세용ㅠ Username: `@없음` ### [NSFW] Screenshots

comment.body:
> AdGuard 베이스 필터 2.3.25.46인데 잘 동작합니다. 나중에 버그가 발생하면 알려주시겠어요? AdGuard for iOS 버그에 가까워 보입니다.

필터 업데이트를 안 했는데도 지금은 또 저절로 고쳐졌네요. 2.3.25.45 그대로거든요. 파워링크 노출될 때 테스트해본 바로는 위에서 언급한 세 필터가 동시에 켜져있을 때만 차단이 안 되는 건 확실한데 필터 업데이트 때문에 그런 건 아니라고 봐야겠네요. 버그가 맞는 것 같습니다. 어떤 경우에 이 버그가 생기는지 직접 구현하기는 어렵네요.

comment.body:
Ok, please do the following:
1. Leave only the AdGuard French
2. Open the filtering log (FL)
3. Reproduce the problem
4. Return to the FL
5. Set only the blocked requests by the filter
6. Take a screenshot
7. Send it here

> [cdn.gwdang.com/plt_nuxt/public/history.bb692cde.js](https://cdn.gwdang.com/plt_nuxt/public/history.bb692cde.js)

I assume a rule below should help.
```adblock
@@||cdn.gwdang.com/plt_nuxt/public/history.*.js$domain=gwdang.com
```

comment.body:
> I suppose that this issue may occurs only if BM_User_Experience cookie is removed on every website refresh.

The issue occurs when we manually clean the cookies, in order to behave like a customer that would navigate on Back Market for the first time.

I just tried to dig a bit in the filters lists and indeed, it's only happening when the "EasyList - Cookie Notices" is also enabled.

Might be related to [this line](https://github.com/easylist/easylist/blob/6c1c354d8b79143f2b001f630aa36eba1c9b5080/easylist_cookie/easylist_cookie_specific_uBO.txt#L977), WDYT? 

What's the best way of fixing the issue, then?

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Bug
labels.description: The issue is caused by a program bug

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS.

@Alex-302?

Are you sure that the GPlinks owner will return to using these old parked domains?
In my opinion, this domain should be removed from the Adguard filter because they will definitely create new domains because they know that Adblocker has blocked ads on the old domains.

issue.body:
### 필터 업데이트를 하신 후에도 작동이 안된다면, 아래 이메일로 문의해주세요. ### 도움이 필요하시면, [filters@adguard.com](mailto:filters@adguard.com) 으로 문의해주세요. > [!IMPORTANT] > [AdGuard for Android](https://adguard.com/ko/adguard-android/overview.html)인 경우에는 List-KR 필터와 사용하시는 웹 브라우저에 대한 HTTPS 필터링이 활성화되어있는지 확인해주세요. 또한, 캐시, 쿠키 및 사이트 데이터 삭제 또한 도움이 됩니다. _Google Play 스토어에 있는 [AdGuard Content Blocker](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.adguard.android.contentblocker&hl=ko)로는 차단이 어렵습니다._ > [!IMPORTANT] > 또한, AdGuard 유료 라이선스 없이 AdGuard for iOS를 사용하시는 분들은 점점 광고 차단하기 어려워질 수 있으니, 블랙 프라이데이 할인 중인 유니콘 프로보다 싼 [stacksocial.com](https://www.stacksocial.com/sales/adguard-family-plan-lifetime-subscription)에서 구입하신 뒤에 Safari 고급 보호 및 List-KR 필터를 활성화해주세요. > [!TIP] > AdGuard for Android에서 설정 탭 -> 일반 -> 앱과 필터 업데이트 -> 필터 자동 업데이트 값을 1시간으로 줄일 수 있습니다. --- ### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://m.fmkorea.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.fmkorea.com) ### Comment > 에펨코리아 홈페이지 광고 차단 우회 생겼습니다. 막아주세용ㅠ Username: `@없음` ### [NSFW] Screenshots

comment.body:
> AdGuard 베이스 필터 2.3.25.46인데 잘 동작합니다. 나중에 버그가 발생하면 알려주시겠어요? AdGuard for iOS 버그에 가까워 보입니다.

지금 파워링크 나옵니다. 필터는 모두 최신 버전으로 업데이트한 상태입니다. 참고로 필터를 업데이트하거나 껐다 켜도 iOS 사파리에서는 바로 반영되지가 않고 3회 새로고침을 해줘야 최종 설정이 똑바로 적용되더군요. 이번에도 필터 업데이트하고 사파리에서 3회 새로고침 했더니 파워링크가 다시 나오네요.

pull_request.title: remove duplicate - donanimhaber.com
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [x] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address



### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

duplicate rule was deleted by adding `xhr` modifier

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/103899764/e8d4cb08-9184-456c-8a57-e1e29cbd0fd5)


</details>

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

`@@||cian.ru^$document`
Это правило для теста, оно отключает фильтрацию.

issue.title: Getting rid of JS rules, used to set a cookie

labels.name: Infrastructure
labels.description: Related to the repository infrastructure

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

We have ~317 JS rules, used to set a cookie. They can be found by:
`document.cookie =`
They must be replaced by `set-cookie` / `set-cookie-reload` / `trusted-set-cookie-reload` scriptlet rules.

There are many old rules, so first you need to check if the site is available, and then the need for the rule.

* For convenience, you can work in a separate browser
* Retrieve the list of domains, clean up duplicates and check if sites exist (if redirects occur, we assume that the site is dead).
* All such rules can be merged into one file, convert them to exception rules and import as custom filter. Then go down the list and check if the rules are needed (other types of problems not related to these rules are skipped).
* If the site is dead - add domains in the comment below. Then we will remove them from the filters.

In order not to overlap with other filter maintainers, it is desirable to perform batch rule replacement via pull-requests (5-10 rules per PR).

### Important
It should be checked with a Dutch or German VPN, because otherwise the cookie usage messages may not appear.

comment.body: Dead domain: `megalyrics.ru`

comment.body:
Видимо не заблокировать. Во многих приложениях используются библиотеки, которые из сети загружают только информацию о рекламе, и часто она не отличается от собственных ресурсов.

Ещё бы глянул HAR, записанный после остановки этого приложения и очистки его данных через информацию о приложении, если только это не приведёт в потере нужных данных. Может загружают рекламу в архиве.
